I was looking forward to getting this because the royal blue is a beautiful color. However, the material was very thin and the sequins didn't cover very well. Some of the sequins were falling off. I tried to start a return only to find that the seller listed it as a non-returnable item due to food safety reasons? Since when did clothing qualify as a food safety item? Order at your own risk folks! I did reach out to Amazon's support team and explained the situation. They promptly issued a refund but told me to keep the jacket. Guess it will be getting donated.  More people had great reviews as opposed to bad reviews though. That being said, if you decide to order one, size up. I'm 5'9", 200 lbs and ordered an XL, since other people also said to size up. The fit was good, just the quality of the material was not.
